In case (C), the phase and amplitude of the twofold oscillations are modified from the oscillations without mount misalignment, because both in-plane anisotropy and misalignments induced out-of-plane components contribute to the signal. In this case, it is expected that the phase of the twofold oscillations changes with temperature, because the relative weight of the two components changes with temperature. In our experiments, however, the phase of the twofold oscillations is always fixed as
